```{python}
#| eval: true
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
from IPython.display import display, Markdown
import pandas as pd
import os.path
import glob
csv_files = glob.glob('../notebooks/*low_pvalue.csv')
markdown_chunks = []
for file_name in csv_files:
    title = os.path.splitext(os.path.basename(file_name))[0].replace('_', ' ').capitalize()
    print(title)
    markdown_chunks.append(f'## {title}')
    markdown_chunks.append(pd.read_csv(file_name).to_markdown())
Markdown('\n\n'.join(markdown_chunks))
```
